img_above_text:
Brown-Iron Cart
With the first of the five element carts down, go and activate the Camp of Seasons Keeper's Shrine. Rest here, then go back on yourself to see the Pale-Axe Stalwart again.
img_below_text:
Instead of finding him wherever you left him kneeling, you'll now see him by the edge of the cliff. As you come back down the stairs to the area where you fought him, you'll see a small set opposite with two Buddha statues on either side. Go up these and to the left, to find him overlooking the mountain. Talk to him and exhaust any new dialogue.
## Camp of Seasons

img_summary: The image depicts a somber, desolate landscape with a prominent, twisted tree at its center. The area is characterized by rocky terrain, sparse vegetation, and several Buddha statues, indicating a place of spiritual significance. The highlighted figure in the image is likely the Pale-Axe Stalwart, who has moved to a new location near the cliff's edge. This scene is part of a walkthrough where the player is instructed to find and interact with this character to progress in the game.
